about_the_game:
The Party Panic official soundtrack!

This DLC contains all the tracks created for Party Panic. There are 15 tracks with a total runtime of 19 minutes.

Once purchased music files will be located in Steam\steamapps\common\PartyPanic\Soundtrack

Track listing:
1) Friendly Competition (00:51)
2) Home Sweet Home (01:51)
3) Goober City (01:24)
4) Danger! (00:51)
5) Arena Battle (01:24)
6) Spooky (00:44)
7) Haunted Forest (01:01)
8) Run Away! (00:49)
9) Mt Goober (00:55)
10) Deathmatch (03:30)
11) Peaceful Forest (01:51)
12) Unfriendly Competition (00:47)
13) Riding Willy (01:36)
14) Hall Of Goobers (00:42)
15) Party Panic! (00:48)
